desc.cn: Go+ 编程语言旨在工程、STEM 教育和数据科学领域应用。
desc.en: The Go+ programming language is designed for engineering, STEM education, and data science.

(debian|ubuntu)/apt.cmd:
sudo bash -c ' echo "deb [trusted=yes] https://pkgs.goplus.org/apt/ /" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/goplus.list'
sudo apt update
sudo apt install gop

fedora/yum.cmd:
sudo bash -c 'echo -e "[goplus]
name=Go+ Repo
baseurl=https://pkgs.goplus.org/yum/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0" > /etc/yum.repos.d/goplus.repo'
sudo yum install gop
